data.text: Ɛwɔ deɛ wɔtu dwetɛ
Wɔtu dadeɛ firi fam,
Onipa ma esum ba awieeɛ;
Baabi a ɛne deɛ ɔdasani teɛ ntam ɛkwan ware no, ɔtu amena de fagudeɛtuo afidie hyɛ hɔ,
Asase a ɛbɔ aduane no,
aboɔdemmoɔ firi nʼabotan mu
Ɔkɔdeɛ biara nnim saa kwan a ahinta no,
Mmoa ahantanfoɔ nnante wɔ hɔ
Onipa nsa paapae abotan denden
Ɔtwa aka fa abotan mu,
Ɔhwehwɛ baabi a nsubɔntene ti wɔ
Nanso ɛhe na yɛbɛhunu deɛ nyansa hyɛ?
Onipa renhunu ne bo a ɛsom;
Na ebunu ka sɛ, “Ɛnni me mu”;
Wɔrentumi mfa sikakɔkɔɔ amapa ntɔ,
Wɔrentumi mfa Ofir sikakɔkɔɔ ntɔ
Wɔrentumi mfa ahwehwɛ anaa sikakɔkɔɔ ntoto ho,
Ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛbɔ ahwene panin ne ahwehwɛboɔ din;
Etiopia akarateboɔ ne no nsɛ;
Ɛnneɛ na ɛhe na nyansa firie?
Wɔde asie abɔdeɛ biara ani,
Ɔsɛeɛ ne Owuo ka sɛ,
Onyankopɔn te ɛkwan a ɛkɔ hɔ ase,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔhwɛ kɔduru nsase ano
Ɛberɛ a ɔhyɛɛ mframa ano den too hɔ
ɛberɛ a ɔkaa no ɔhyɛ so kyerɛɛ osutɔ
afei ɔhwɛɛ nyansa na ɔkarii no hwɛeɛ;
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ onipa sɛ,
